meanings.definition: Having the most pleasing flavor or taste.
meanings.sent1: The cake was the tastiest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent2: This soup is the tastiest I've ever had.
meanings.sent3: Even the pickiest eater couldn't resist the tastiest pizza in town.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the tastiest melody to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The fresh strawberries were the tastiest treat on a hot summer day.

meanings.sent1: The homemade cookies were the tastiest treats at the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: She always bakes the tastiest pies for Thanksgiving.
meanings.sent3: The tastiest ice cream in the world would probably be made of rainbows and sunshine.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were the tastiest spice to their conversations.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread is the tastiest aroma in the morning.
